sentences.en: And even today, their cordiality is often more out of necessity than conviction.
sentences.cn: 即使在今天, 他们之间的友好经常是出于必要,而不是由于信念.

sentences.en: During all these conversations the utmost frankness and usually a spirit of cordiality prevailed.
sentences.cn: 所有这些会议都笼罩着极其坦率而且通常是热诚亲切的气氛.

sentences.en: Egypt wants to solve the problem in an atmosphere of cordiality.
sentences.cn: 埃及想要友好地解决该问题。

sentences.en: His cordiality was proof that he knew I had no wish to speak to him.
sentences.cn: 他对我这样殷勤表示他知道我不愿意理他.

sentences.en: Hostility could more readily be replaced by respect, cordiality, even friendship.
sentences.cn: 敌视不难变为尊重 、 热诚甚至是友好.

sentences.en: McGinnity was put off balance by the cordiality.
sentences.cn: 麦金尼蒂被这种热诚、亲切的话语,弄得不知所措.

sentences.en: My hostess greeted me with unexpected cordiality.
sentences.cn: 我的女主人以出乎意外的热诚迎接我。

sentences.en: The beautiful weather, happy you, the happy cordiality moistens you!
sentences.cn: 美丽的天气, 美好的你, 美好情意滋润你!

sentences.en: The Chinese even amid the greatest cordiality kept their distance.
sentences.cn: 中国人即使在最融洽的气氛中也保持一定的距离.

sentences.en: The desalination emotion, the far cordiality, the false code cannot block from the frail heart.
sentences.cn: 淡化的情感, 渐远的情意,虚伪的密语遮不住脆弱的心.

sentences.en: The fat man received him with his usual boisterous cordiality.
sentences.cn: 那胖子以他一贯的兴高采烈的热诚接待了他。

sentences.en: The head of the organization said in a letter of congratulation to the new pope that he hoped for cordiality and sincere friendship.
sentences.cn: 而在本尼迪克教皇任职期间两教关系出现问题，该组织领袖在致新教皇的祝贺信中表示，希望两教能促成热诚和真挚的友谊。

sentences.en: They received her with every effort of cordiality.
sentences.cn: 他们还是尽心竭力地款待她.

sentences.en: This time Goering did not try to dodge the issue by pretending cordiality.
sentences.cn: 这一回戈林不再虚与委蛇地回避问题.

words.tran_cn: 补品；兴奋剂；甜香酒，甘露酒
